name: Garden Chair Framing (Unfinished College Project)
description:
Unfinished College Project

You play as a ferret (named Frrrt) who was kidnapped by Garden Chair the anteater in order for you to collect some items for him unless you want to be set on fire. There are some interesting characters you have to talk to or complete tasks for in order to get items, including a pelican and a fish both called Steve, the pelican cannot talk and the fish talks for both for them and also refers to himself in the third person, there is an alpaca called Bert who believes that he is a bush, and a werefish called Rick who is a magician.

This game is unfinished, probably never will be finished, and a bit broken in some places and will likely never be fixed. There is a video of the entire playthrough.
